subject: Baseball
Weather
lead_paragraph: A persistent morning storm blanketed Coors Field in snow Sunday, but by 1 p.m., the snow had melted, supplying more evidence of the region’s famously irregular weather patterns.
snippet: A persistent morning storm blanketed Coors Field in snow Sunday, but by 1 p.m., the snow had melted, supplying more evidence of the region’s famously irregular weather patterns.
